title: EU Champs Set Sights on World Stage

Ok i've master Nid in ranked games. the only people smart enough to beat nidalee are yasuo or something. Nidalee is easiest champion BESIDES master yi, takes know skill Q, R W E to mions then kick back our R Q back to minons R W E Q R kick back out Q. can do this for days GG
So what are you bronze 3? Keep playing nidalee an rise up to higher ranks... you will see that she is more of a challenge to play
No*
pretty sure he's saying nids not a high-skill cap champ

?
Nidalee has one of the highest skill caps in the game. Being easy to learn =/= low skill cap.

Not do be a snob, but you need to go play Nid at a high level of play and then tell me she's easy. Cat form is hell, and she has an insane amount of skills to manage while dueling. Contrary to belief, she won't win anything with just Q at a good tier.
Always remember season 1...
Still waiting for Finatic Skins since they did the same for TPA And now SKT. Rito, Let the Finatics get there skins.
Only the winners of the LCS gets the skins
So many things wrong with what you just said......

@Shinobininja313 they won the Season 1 World Championship, but they didn't get skins because the skins aren't created or funded by RIOT, it's funded by each team and created by varying League artists, depending on their country. Fnatic wasn't a big enough company at the time, so they couldn't actually make the skins. Taipei and SKT got skins because League can reward them a bigger prize for winning than in Season 1. Basically, Fnatic SHOULD have skins for their champions, but they don't due to lack of funding at the time.
SKT T1 skins are funded by Riot.
